options: To manage asynchronous operations and callbacks

options: Hashing can be decrypted, encryption cannot
Hashed data cannot be decrypted with a key (one-way function), unlike encrypted data

options: To handle large files without loading entire file into memory

What is the purpose of Worker Threads in Node.js?
options: To run JavaScript in parallel (true parallelism)

questions.question: What is the purpose of Clusters in Node.js?
options: To create multiple Node.js processes sharing server ports

questions.question: Which method in the path module joins path segments and handles separators?
What is the main purpose of body-parser middleware in Express?
options: To parse incoming request bodies and make them accessible via req.body

What is the difference between CommonJS and ES Modules?
options: CommonJS is asynchronous, ES Modules are synchronous
CommonJS is synchronous loading, ES Modules are asynchronous loading
CommonJS is for browsers, ES Modules for Node.js

questions.question: Which command starts Node.js with the inspector for debugging?
What is the Event Emitter pattern used for in Node.js?
options: To enable event-driven programming by allowing objects to emit named events and register listeners

What is the purpose of profiling in Node.js?
options: To analyze application performance and identify bottlenecks
